attributes.action: Create another tax band for people earning for than £50k
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having recently entered full time employment and started on my career after university, I am astonished that the top rate of tax is for people earning a good average salary!  

I propose that the top tax band be only applied to people earning more than £50k, and a 4th band created in between.  For example:
Earnings of £0-£9k would be tax free.  
Earnings of £10k-£19k would attract tax of 10%.  
Earnings of £20k-£29k would attract tax of 20%.  
Earnings of £30k-£39k would attract tax of 30%.  
Earnings of £40k-£49k would attract tax of 40%.  
Earnings of £50k+ would attract tax of 47.5%.
